categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel
Category:Imperial Army generals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text:
Bernard Vota was a Human male Imperial general who was one of the leaders of the Restored Empire faction. Bulger served as his aide.
Vota died during a failed invasion of Orinda, wishing that he had never aligned himself with Ennix Devian. His last words were "Devian-Devian...Don`t Leave Me!".
